title.label: Chess game won’t work/no app support/REFUND

content.label:
I can’t drag the chess pieces to their correct holes. The game will reveal the patterns of pieces and holes, but won’t allow me to drag them.  I’ve tried multiple different tactics, quitting/saving, etc with no luck. Please help. My review will be revised once I am able to continue playing. Thanks in advance

After trying to contact app support and the devs with no success, I WANT A REFUND.  Game is unplayable

Controls on iOS are not smooth or responsive at all. I have lumbered my way through this game and now am at the chess puzzle. I know how to solve it but the dragging mechanism is not remotely responding. It’s very frustrating because I think this game is very enjoyable and would be 5 stars otherwise. For $4.99 o would expect much better.
The best

I got the priest to polish the goblet and compared it to one of the tombs: the hint tells me to go to the map, choose the big red arrow and go back to Spain. However all the country maps are grey and the only flag I can interact with is Paris. I have tried multiple times. Quit the game and restored to my last saved game, but the map only permits me to go to Paris.

name.label: Born to fish, forced to work

content.label: I have reached the stage in the game where I have received the polished chalice back from the priest, and I should be returning to Spain. However, when I go to the airport, I am not able to tap on Spain to travel back. I am not very happy that I have come this far in the game, only to have to abandon the game due to an error.

title.label: The game is stop in Syria market on 63%

content.label:
Hi dear developers 
Please help and update the game .
When I sell the statue and get the money , the game is stop working . The character doesn’t move .
Please help 
Thanks

*** Updated review:
Awesome, awesome, awesome. Thank you so much for listening, and releasing an update so quickly!!! The storyline, gameplay, voice talent, graphics, and music are so well done and beautifully interwoven... I can’t wait to start playing the next chapter! Thanks again developers!

*** Previous review:
I just purchased the BrokenSword bundle, and everything was amazing!... until I installed the standard iOS 13.1.1 update, and now for some reason my gameplay screen is very small, and appears in the upper left-hand corner of my LCD display. It’s very hard to see anything, and nearly impossible to click. I’m extremely sad, because I’m only in the first few stages of BS1, and now I can’t progress. Please, Developers, send help soon!!!

...Other than that, obviously, the game is fantastic.

** I’ve also tried restarting the game, restarting my iPhone, and deleting & reinstalling the app entirely. Sadly, no success... it really needs an update. 

Oddly, it seems BS2’s gameplay is just fine! but — since I’d rather start with the first one — I’m now just waiting... :’-(

The game will not play on iPhone X IOS 13.
It will just display a black screen. I am very disappointed considering I love this game and just found out it was on IOS. Don’t waste your money for a game you can’t play.
This game is not playable now after update 2.0.7 for the video will not play.
Getting a black screen when starting a new a new game. Please fix it !
Menu is now fixed but now new game just show black screen and get stuck. Same black screen also appears between loading screens and gets stuck. Cant continue the game. Pls fix.
PLEASE update to support IOS 13!! I love this game!

Not sure if this is an iOS bug or a game bug but as written by other reviewers this is not playable as the menu is on the top left of the screen and you can’t click on anything. Let’s see if new versions of iOS will fix this or if Revolution gives a patch.
Will there be a compatibility update?
I love broken Sword I love George an Nico it is my favorite game 😍

July 2019

Rather than the same puzzles as other point/click games, Broken Sword uses logic to sneak around. There are a few puzzles, but those are not the common ones that I’ve seen. This is one of my favorites; right up there with Thimbleweed Park.

I had a bit of trouble with clicking on some touch points, however I’m on iPhone 6s, so that’s on me. It worked best if I flicked my finger downward over the spots (ie: inventory bag). 

Pros:
 Storyline, voice acting, puzzles, graphics, music, hint system, mechanics.

Cons:
 Hoping in an update there will be an option to make the characters walk faster.
This would have been a great game, say around 1987. But for today, it’s too slow, AND the inventory controls are clunky at best... when they even work. Disappointed.
I don’t usually write reviews but this is one of the best point and click adventures I’ve played in a while. Wonderful gameplay and storyline.
I really enjoy this even though it’s a cut
Something wrong in this game i cant play it in Iphone x why ??

This is a beautiful game set primarily in Paris. Characters have amusing French traits and idiosyncrasies.  It feels like a graphic novel detective story. The puzzles include finding objects, interviewing people, and tricking people into doing what you need them to do.

I am halfway through the second game, The Smoking Mirror, and it is also excellent..

title.label: Waste of a lot of time

content.label: Having to repeat sections and ask each character endless questions is a bore.  The game should flow more quickly and not bog down over and over.  Even reading the walk through did not move it along.  I am retired, but even I don’t want to invest all the time this game takes!  I quit after chapter 7.
This is absolutely outstanding!  Some of the very best adventure gaming ever!!!!

Downloaded based on the good reviews. But this app has problems. You can hover the correct key over a lock but nothing happens. Controls are difficult and now I can’t progress past the safe, which I cannot open.  Wasted money so far.
Hi, I just bought this game. But it crashes in some places and you cannot skip it... disappointing. Planning to get a refund...
Love adventure games and just started playing this one but so far, it's boss!
LOVE it..... bought the whole bundle and HOPE the developers create more...more....more!!! 💞💖💓❤️❣️
I'm really enjoying this classic adventure game 😊😊
My childhood when this was on the original PlayStation!

title.label: You just can't beat the Classics

content.label:
I've always enjoyed "Old School Adventure/RPGs" and the Broken Sword series was one of the best!!!

This an excellent software port to the iOS and I sincerely hope to see more Classic games brought back into the iOS inventory!!

Runs great on my iPad Air and iPhone 6; no errors or crashes.

Worth the money for both quality and entertainment!!!
Such a great series and they are amazing for the iOS 5/5 for all of them.
Nice point and click game

I can see the story , the art , everything's great! But I can't get the items to work right. The gears are going, the inventory object is all lit up, and... Boom! Doesn't work! Wish I could get my money back! What a shame!
Honestly one the best games ever made its a classic! Make a new one!

If you are looking for a awesome game to play buy this. Every cent I spent on it was worth it. Such a cool murder mystery. Buy this game. The characters are very good and the game keeps you hooked all the time. Seriously you should definitely get this game.
Good puzzles, great atmosphere

Sometimes things take awhile to work even after doing it many times the same thing (bugs? Or I'm not doing them right?!) but other than that it's kinda fun when I'm not stuck. So exciting when it does work haahah oh but I would take out the jigsaw puzzle (or at least cheat for it)--too hard.

Felt like a I was playing a 70's or 80's adventure cartoon movie with the way the audio sounded and the cartoon's art style looks like something from "The Hobbit" era. Many hours of gameplay involved. I am blown away. I wish part 3 and 4 were also added to iOS. Getting part 2 and 5 now.

title.label: One of the best adventure games of all time

content.label: The Broken Sword adventure games rank among the best in the genre, and compare favorably to favorites such as Sierra's King's Quest or LucasArts' Monkey Island series.  The iOS version is beautifully remastered for mobile devices and fully voiced.  A must have for adventure game fans and anyone who appreciates an artfully-told story.
Game appears to hang on one puzzle. Specifically, the bible verse highlighting puzzle. Otherwise, love it.

title.label: Best version of a longtime favorite!

content.label: Simply the best version of one of the best point-and-click games out there.  iOS gaming doesn't get much better than this.  Enjoy the game!
I love all the Broken Sword Games!

title.label: Stuck too early in the game hints don't help

content.label:
Well I just started playing this game and I'm already stuck. Tried using the hints but those have not worked. 

I can't solve the
two puzzles to unlock the gate in the area where the boat is. Prior to that I was finding the game mildly interesting.  Right now I'm feeling like I wasted my money. Because there was only one other review I was skeptical. Should have paid attention to my instinct.

The overall interface was a little clunky IMO, but there were no real problems with it except for the chess puzzles, which were almost unsolvable because I couldn't physically move the pieces without way more effort and concentration than should be necessary.

My other major complaint is that the cut scenes are not subtitled for those who need them.
My older brother and I played this back in 1995 when I was 7 years old. Now in 2014 it is just as much fun as I remember!

You start out playing this awesome French journalist, but shortly afterward you end up playing this total buffoon.  I mean one of those asswipes who assumes all kinds of things about people based on stereotypes.  The kind of person I always want to punch in the nose.  So I was actually angry at the end when he... Well, I won't give it away.  

Also, there are no subtitles for the cutscenes.  Very annoying.

The game mechanics are solid, though, and the puzzles are fun.  I don't regret the purchase.
I really enjoyed the playable cartoon aspect of this game.

Awesome game reminiscent of Sierra type adventure games like Space Quest .... Really cant find these type of games anymore.... Adventure games either have a gazillion hidden object scenes (blegh) or require a ridiculous level of violence, so thank you Revolution! Busy downloading part 2 :)

I'm stuck at the pub in Ireland. I can't use the wire,, both the bartender and lead character shrug. Spent hours on this. Unable to contact dev. Would give it 5 stars if I wasn't so maddeningly stuck. I'm not a complainer, I don't write bad reviews. Please fix!

I read a few of the criticisms of the game, and most seem to be grounded in the players' inability to figure things out. For example, it's not a glitch that you don't have an item, it's that you haven't found the item yet, and may need to look for it elsewhere.  Also, the manuscript isn't hard to get out of once you figure out that you first have to zoom in on each of the five parts.  The game is somewhat linear so that sometimes you can't do an activity until you've done another one, but that's part of the challenge. With a little patience most tasks can be figured out, and when I'd run out of patience, i found the hint system mostly excellent (there was one exception, but I then figured out what to do). 

This game reminded me of Yesterday by Bulkypix, which I also highly recommend to those who haven't yet had the pleasure of playing it.
